ygData.subject: Shaman Soloing...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a lvl 25 shaman and I am trying to solo but wondering if I just have it wrong.  I spend more time medding than anything else. What are some decent zones
ygData.messageBody:
I have a lvl 25 shaman and I am trying to solo but wondering if I
just have it wrong. I spend more time medding than anything else.
What are some decent zones to attemp to solo at my lvl and what
strageties do some of you higher lvl Shammies recommend I do? I need
to build my skills so MMs are OUT !! PP is always nice but at this
point not a necessity. My Mana pool is at about 1186 and HP is about
763 unbuffed. Is that on par or do I need to update my equipment.
My base stats are currently.
----------|
ENDR: 879 |
AC: 506 |
ATK: 385 |
----------|
STR: 126 |
STA: 124 |
AGI: 126 |
DEX: 138 |
----------|
WIS: 185 |
INT: 118 |
CHA: 75 |
----------|--
POISON: 40 |
MAGIC: 37 |
DISEASE: 47 |
FIRE: 32 |
COLD: 44 |
------------|

Thanks Rick

{
25th Shaman "Ribits"
57th Necro "DeathTicket"
54th Druid "LeafSkin"
63rd Cleric "Lifesphere"
61st Enchanter "Mindmender"
}
(Fenin Ro Server)
